verbose_text: In our study, we found that I/R injury can induce the increase in pro inflammatory cytokines TNF-alpha, IL-1beta and IL-6, pro apoptotic protein Bax and cleavage caspase 3, and the decrease in anti-apoptotic BCL-2 and caspase 3.
evidence: I/R injury can induce the increase in pro-inflammatory cytokines TNF-alpha, IL-1beta and IL-6
